document_data.name: ''Drums of panic''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drums of panic''''' were a variety of magical kettle [[drum]]s that induced a state of fear in nearby creatures.
document_data.Description: Largely unremarkable in appearance, these drums always came in pairs and had hemispheres of {{SIrange|1|1.5|ft|long=yes}} in diameter. Each of these drums weighed around {{SI|5|lb|long=yes}}.
document_data.Availability: * Some ''drums of panic'' were known to be found in the land of [[Zakhara]], as ancient tales spoke of great cities ruled by [[marid]]s that used ''[[wall against noise|walls against noise]]'' to protect against them and other auditory-based magical items.
document_data.Powers:
These drums emitted a moderate [[aura]] of [[necromantic]] magic. Once per day, Additionally, when played underwater the effective range of ''drums of panic'' doubled to {{SI|240|ft|long=yes}}.<ref>

Those who succumbed to the magic would attempt to flee as fast as possible in the opposite direction of the drums. Creatures within an animal-level of intelligence were more susceptible to the effect. Additionally, it was much harder for creatures to resist the effects of ''drums of panic'' played in the hands of a bard, with its power to effect the mind scaling with a bard's skills.
document_data.Creation: Turning a pair of kettle drums into ''drums of panic'' required a [[spellcaster]] with skills in crafting wondrous items and the [[spell]] ''[[fear]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Everett Taber]], a musician in [[Ravens Bluff]].{{Cite trumpeter/2-11/Bard's Guild Damaged|2}}
